SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS NUM, ROW.* FROM ( SELECT SYSLOG.LOG_SQ "logSq", SYSLOG.EVENT_IP "eventIp", SYSLOG.USER_ID "userId", DATE_FORMAT(SYSLOG.EVENT_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') "eventDt", SYSLOG.EVENT_CD "eventCd", CODEINFO.CODE_NM "eventNm", SYSLOG.LOG_MSG "logMsg" FROM TB_FR_SYS_LOG SYSLOG, TB_FR_CODE_INFO CODEINFO WHERE 1=1 AND SYSLOG.EVENT_CD = CODEINFO.CODE_SQ
AND UPPER(SYSLOG.USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{srchUserId}), '%')
AND SYSLOG.EVENT_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{fromEventDt}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
AND SYSLOG.EVENT_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{toEventDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
AND SYSLOG.EVENT_CD IN ('LOG_000011', 'LOG_000012', 'LOG_000013')
AND SYSLOG.EVENT_CD IN (SELECT CODE_SQ FROM TB_FR_CODE_INFO WHERE PARENT_CODE_SQ = 'LOG_000002' AND USE_YN = 'Y')
AND UPPER(SYSLOG.EVENT_CD) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{srchEventCd}), '%')
ORDER BY SYSLOG.EVENT_DT DESC, SYSLOG.LOG_SQ DESC
) ROW, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) B ) F WHERE NUM <= #{readcount}+#{readindex} AND NUM > #{readindex}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FR_SYS_LOG WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{srchUserId}), '%')
AND EVENT_DT >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{fromEventDt}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
AND EVENT_DT <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{toEventDt}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
AND EVENT_CD IN ('LOG_000011', 'LOG_000012', 'LOG_000013')
AND EVENT_CD IN (SELECT CODE_SQ FROM TB_FR_CODE_INFO WHERE PARENT_CODE_SQ = 'LOG_000002' AND USE_YN='Y')
AND UPPER(EVENT_CD) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{srchEventCd}), '%')
